about.name: AJ Southammavong
about.title: Software Developer
about.bio: I am a software developer who loves to build and design web applications. I am also passionate about learning new technologies and staying up-to-date with the latest trends in the industry.

experience.title: Digital Analyst
responsibilities: Client Onboarding: Efficiently integrate new clients into various marketing platforms, ensuring smooth transitions and setups.
Tracking & Goals: Develop, implement, and monitor tracking tags and goals to ensure accurate data collection and reporting.
Process Improvement: Continuously search for opportunities to enhance tracking and reporting processes for better performance and accuracy.
Data Layer Management: Determine and manage key-value pairs to be pushed out of the data layer for robust tracking.
Debugging: Identify and resolve web browser events or issues to maintain seamless user experiences.
Client-Specific Projects: Tailor projects to meet client's unique needs and objectives, ensuring personalized and effective solutions.
Report Development: Organize data and maintain detailed spreadsheets to develop comprehensive End-of-Month (EOM) and quarterly reports for each client.
Cross-Department Communication: Collaborate with other departments to ensure alignment and coherence in marketing strategies.
